956270.name: DISRUPTION
956270.description:
THE STORY

In the near-future city of Nutropolis, people are entirely dependent on AI and robotics. Powerful, multi-international-corporations exploit the disrupted, crumbling society. Chief among them, Arise Robotics. As citizens eagerly purchase the newest AI agents and service bots, their neglected and discarded predecessors are salvaged and assembled into a mutant lethal force by an embittered AI developer fanatic hellbent on destroying Arise and the everyday lives of Nutropolis citizens.

Who will stop Ohmage and the ReGex? And how far will Arise go to dominate the globe and the bodies of its citizens?

Starting with a small, violent uprising, you fight in a series of deadly mission in Nutropolis rooftops, alleys, and sewers to take down the rogue robot faction. But are you fighting the right fight?

THE WORLD

DISRUPTION is set in the city of Nutropolis, a sprawling mix of post-modern high-rises, robo-ghetto-infested tenements, empty post-industrial factories and abandoned, underground transportation tunnels. Players are challenged to navigate and survive threats and battles set in locations that range from narrow alleyways, treacherous rooftops, a partially flooded derelict subway system, cyber-vermin-infested subterranean labyrinths, and a seedy underbelly district of human-robot interaction.

GAME PLAY

DISRUPTION expands the shooter genre with aerial drone flight, hand-to-bot melees, bot-boxing and specialized weaponry. The environments are designed in a series of wide levels that are precise and rich in detail without being repetitive or scattered. Core missions evolve the story line while non-serialized side missions allow exploration and expansion.

Enlist into the elite Robot Control (ROCON) Combat Unit, a squad of paramilitary agents tasked with shutting down ReGex’s network to prevent Nutropolis from falling into ruin. Choose from multiple weapon loadouts and kits, each with a unique playstyle, but all designed to cut through swarms of robots. Utilize destructive vehicles like the QuadPod to make missiles fall down on the ReGex. There are multiple approaches to completing objectives; identify the most effective strategy for you! Are you ready to join the fight?

PROTECT THE CITY

Protect the sprawling city of Nutropolis. From treacherous rooftops and subterranean labyrinths to the seedy underbelly of human-robot interaction, you battle lethal bots around every corner.

DEFINE YOUR PLAY STYLE

From drones to grenade launchers to sniper rifles and more, loadouts are key to successfully completing DISRUPTION’s challenging missions. With multiple weapon options, each with a unique playstyle, it’s down to you to decide how you approach each encounter.

CONTROL SPECIALIZED WEAPONS

Take to the skies and rain missiles down on your enemies. Traverse any terrain to track down robotic monstrosities. As your missions evolve, so do your vehicles.

USE YOUR ENVIRONMENT

Interact with the environment to give yourself a battle advantage. Rogue ReGex blocking your path? Take aim at the sign above, and watch it rain mass destruction on your enemies. Or hit gas lines, buildings, vehicles. Explosive chaos is a vital tool in your arsenal.

THE ROCON WEAPONS LAB

SURVIVE THE SWARM

Outnumbered by enemy AI and its' robots, you must survive the swarm of ReGex hellbent on destroying Arise and the everyday lives of Nutropolis citizens. There is no limit to what ReGex will do. It will take every weapon in your arsenal to take down these savage mutant humanoids. But are you fighting the right fight? Disruption awaits.

Disruption awaits.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
